attributes.action: Enforce, modify current laws or make new laws to prevent vehicles parking on footways
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Becoming more difficult to walk along footpaths without having to detour into road to go around parked vehicles that park up on the footways - enforcement required. Real problem for disabled, blind people.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with your local council.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
